Text: Vogo lost his shipment, and I lost my \n reward when Vogo ran away. \n As always, dealing with Vogo stinks...

WHAT!? 
 How am I supposed 
 to make out on 
 this deal then?
What went wrong \n in the manufacturing \n process?
One way or the other, \n I'm getting answers \n from Vogo!
Come on, take out \n those monsters.
And it's not just the \n stuff in the boxes.

The smoke isn't going 
 away, and it's 
 attracting more and 
 more Nevi.
Think of the money I \n could've made...
Alright, but you're \n gonna tell me what's \n going on when I'm done!
Something stinks...
N-No, of course not.
I'm gonna have to \n smash all of your \n shipping crates.
I know whatever was in \n those boxes is what \n attracted the Nevi.
Vogo! Please tell me \n you're not planning on \n trying again?
That's the last of 'em.
Vogo, are you alright?
Kat, help!
It takes time for \n the stuff to fully \n break down.
Destroying the boxes \n isn't enough?
What?
But enough \n about that!
Oh! Would you \n look at that!?
And there was a lot of \n it in those boxes.

*Sigh* The whole batch 
 got wiped out because it 
 went and spontaneously 
 reacted on me.
AAAH!
These aren't Vogo's.
Aww, come on...
What's wrong, Vogo?
I was storing my \n cargo here...

And some of it's 
 missing! I only had my 
 eyes off of it for a 
 second.
Uh, again? It's getting \n harder and harder to \n feel sorry for you.

Hey, I'm a busy man! I 
 can't just stand around 
 staring at boxes all 
 day.
Sun Shipping would \n be in deep trouble \n if it weren't for Fi.
I figured it'd be \n safe here, nice and \n out of sight.
This is bad. \n If someone discovers \n what's inside...
N-Never mind \n I said that!
What IS inside?
Nothing special, \n nothing at all.
Please, you gotta \n find my cargo!
The lion seal in this \n picture is on all of the \n boxes.
They haven't been \n missing long.
I'm sure they're still \n somewhere in Endestria.

Something's not 
 right about this, 
 but I can't just 
 leave you out to dry.
You'll have my undying \n gratitude, Kat!
I'll make sure you're \n well rewarded.
No lion seal...
They're not here.
He couldn't have gone far.
Not here...
Where'd he go?
Where is he!?
I should check the crates around here.
There are some crates there.
Hmm, maybe I'll spot something from there.
I should check from there.
I should search from there.
I might see something if I look around from here.
Hmm, could these be them?
Suspicious Man: \n Hey, who are you!?
H-Hey, wait!
I'll bet he's involved! I need to catch him.
Catch the Suspicious Man
Lost him.
Find the Suspicious Man
I should have a look around from here.
I should find a place with a good view of the area.
Find the boxes with \n the lion seal in this \n picture.
They have to still be in \n Endestria somewhere.
I can't see from way up here...
I need to go up a little higher for a better look.
Where'd that guy go?
I could get a better look from up there.
I wonder if I can find him from here?
Hmm, maybe I should check from over that way.
Huh?
Found him!
He went that way.
Vogo: \n What are you doing!?
Not these either...
Old Man's Voice: \n Ah?
Wha-?
The crates with the lion logo have to be in Endestria.
That guy has to know something, I need to find him!
I should have a look from above.
The stolen cargo should be Endestria...
Maybe those?
Over there...
What about those crates?
I just have to look for crates with the lion seal.
Find Sun Shipping's Crates
I need to go up and get a better look.
I'm too far up...
I need to go up a little higher for a better look.
No lion seal... \n These can't be the \n right boxes.
I should look \n somewhere else.
Over there!
I could get a good look from that tower.
I need to find those missing crates.
I've already looked here, I should try somewhere else.
These aren't the boxes \n either. Wait... What's \n this on the ground?
An old Alias \n wanted poster!
The Hekseville \n Phantom...
What was he doing in \n Jirga Para Lhao?
And why did he help \n Lisa and the others \n get to Hekseville?
Could Alias be behind \n the missing cargo?
Meow...
Nah, it couldn't be... \n Let's keep looking \n around.
This guy might \n know something.
Hey, could I bother you \n for a second?
Can you hear me?
Hmm?
He reacted!
I need to ask you \n something.
Back in my day, it was \n all-natural...
What...?
Youngins nowadays are \n making those fake \n rocks of theirs...
They think that's the \n easy way to make a \n fortune...
What the heck is \n he talking about?
Nature does what \n it does for a reason, \n you know?
You can't just break its \n laws and expect to get \n away with it.

With the fake stuff, all 
 it takes is one mistake, 
 and you end up with that 
 horrible smell.
Not to mention they \n attract those nasty \n things...
All-natural - it's the \n only way to go.
Uh... Think maybe \n it's time to go ask \n someone else.
What are you doin' \n sniffin' around here?
I'm looking for \n something.
What?
Some stolen cargo.
Boxes with a lion seal \n on them...
Uh, nothin' like that \n around here.
Now get lost!
He's hiding \n something.
What are you \n not telling me?
None of your business!
Found you!
How did-?
Those boxes have the \n lion seal. I knew it. \n You're the thief!
I'll let you go if you \n hand over the boxes, \n nice and quiet.
Fat chance!
The stuff in there's \n worth a fortune!
I'm gonna unload it \n and make a bundle!
Not if I stop you.
How are you gonna do \n that, pipsqueak?
Ugh, this stinks!
Well, this is what \n happens when you \n break the law.
N-No, really. \n It's awful...
It's your fault!
Agh, my eyes \n are watering!
If you think a few \n tears are gonna get \n you out of this...
W-Wait... \n It does stink!
A-AAH!
Is that smoke pouring \n out of the boxes \n attracting Nevi?
Guess I'd better \n smash 'em up.
The lion symbol! Vogo's missing cargo!
Huh, wha-!?
What's with all these Nevi?
Defeat the Nevi
More Nevi?
Destroy the Crates
Return to Vogo
I knew it!
Crates
I need to get back to Vogo.
I knew it! Nevi here too.
I can't just let the Nevi go.
I have to destroy those crates.
Vogo: \n Do something!
Vogo: \n Aah! Stay back!
The Nevi will keep coming if I don't destroy those crates!
That takes care of the crates, now for the Nevi!
Huh? It's just that old guy from before.
Wha-? Vogo?
Vogo: \n Later!
Get back here!
I can't just leave those Nevi...
